name: Bob - The Hammer Guy
description:
Help Bob not to lose his job. With the hammer, hit as many nails as you can, and avoid making mistakes, otherwise the boss will fire you!

Hugo Luciano de Souza - - Game Developer  https://www.hugolsouza.com

Carlos Oliveira - Game Developer

João Gabriel Prates - 3D Art https://www.artstation.com/jprates

Gustavo Dill Volkweis - 3D Art https://www.artstation.com/gustavodillv

João Gabriel Tomasi - Music, Sound https://soundcloud.com/jgtomasi

Giuseppe Panno Gonçalves de Oliveira - Game Design
